text: The Yongcheng North railway station () is a railway station of Zhengzhou–Xuzhou High-Speed Railway in Mangshan Town, Yongcheng, Henan, China. The station started operation on 10 September 2016, together with the railway. The station is from Yongcheng downtown, and from Mangdang Mountain scenic area. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Henan Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Xuzhou–Lanzhou High-Speed Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2016 Category:Shangqiu
title: Yongcheng North railway station
